backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, access control, and file attachments for customers and drivers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA and responsiveness features to related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and pages for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables, themes, and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, manifest links, and icon references for Android installability.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and generated icon assets.
frontend/public/sw.js: Minimal service worker implementing basic caching and install/activate lifecycle events for PWA support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root configuring TanStack Router routes and registering the service worker for PWA support.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a user lacks admin permissions, including alert and login button.
frontend/src/components/AuthRequiredScre: Screen prompting unauthenticated users to log in, with explanatory card and login button.
frontend/src/components/forms/FieldError: Small component showing an inline validation error with an icon.
frontend/src/components/forms/StarRating: Interactive 1â€“5 star rating input with hover, keyboard support, and optional clearing.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, errors, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying brand info, navigation links, contact details, and WhatsApp helpers.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, navigation, contact info, login, and conditional admin/profile links.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout combining header, footer, routed content, and the profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Schemat: Visual map schematic that normalizes coordinates and displays a pulsing driver marker.
frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts: Static business contact and service info exported as a config object.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Hook determining authentication and admin status by querying the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttachments.ts: Hooks for fetching and uploading caller attachments via the backend with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Hooks for loading and saving the caller's user profile and a helper for display name extraction.
frontend/src/hooks/useDriverLocationUpda: Provides a mutation to update a driver's location and invalidates related tracking and booking queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, managing identity loading, login, and state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains booking-related queries and mutations including fetching, submitting, assigning drivers, and updating booking status with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRateCard.ts: Fetches and updates the rate card via actor calls, with cache invalidation after updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferral.ts: Handles referral code generation, retrieval, bonus lookup, and applying referral codes using actor-based queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTracking.ts: Provides tracking queries to fetch booking details and driver location with optional polling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes along with mobile-friendly layout adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the company's story, values, and mission using styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Admin interface for viewing bookings, editing the rate card, and assigning drivers with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/BookCabPage.tsx: Implements a cab booking form with validation, profile-prefilled data, submission handling, and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with hero section and multiple cards showing phone, helpline, WhatsApp, email, service area, and business hours.
frontend/src/pages/DomainSetupPage.tsx: Displays a domain setup guide with notices and step-by-step instructions for purchasing a domain and configuring DNS.
frontend/src/pages/DriverLocationUpdateP: Provides an authenticated driver interface to validate booking and update their live location with form input and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Shows a FAQ page using an accordion listing common questions and answers about booking and services.
frontend/src/pages/FleetPage.tsx: Displays a fleet overview with cards describing each vehicle type, its capacity, features, and ideal use cases.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero banner, feature highlights, and navigation buttons for booking and services.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays pricing ranges, factors affecting fares, and example cost cards with a disclaimer.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page handling identity checks, payment method updates, referral code actions, and file uploads for attachments.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of available cab services with icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders customer testimonials with ratings and a structured card layout.
frontend/src/pages/TrackingPage.tsx: Tracks a booking by ID, showing booking details, status, driver location, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/utils/paymentMethods.ts: Defines payment method options and provides helpers for retrieving payment method labels.
frontend/src/utils/principalText.ts: Validates and parses principal ID text into a Principal object with basic error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp contact URLs and formats numbers based on business info.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, existing PWA features, requirements, and metadata for the AASRA Cab App.
